title: Caught out of Position
text:
Starting with the player that has the
Initiative, both players may choose
1 enemy model and make a 2" dodge
with that model. The chosen model
is a friendly model during this action.

title: Risky Play
text:
The opposing player may choose
one of their Squaddie models.
The chosen model gains +1 TAC.

title: Play to the Crowd
text:
Friendly models may spend 1 less
MP to make Snap Shots.

title: Pick up the Pace!
text:
Starting with the player that has the
Initiative, both players may choose
1 friendly Squaddie model.
The chosen models gain +2"/+2" MOV.

title: Boot Sponsorship
text:
Friendly models may use Gliding
without spending MP.

title: Mud Slide
text:
Choose a piece of rough ground on
the pitch. The chosen terrain piece
instead counts as fast ground.

title: Punching Bag
text:
Choose a friendly Squaddie model.
The chosen model gains Tough Hide.
detail:
(This model suffers –1 DMG from enemy
plays and playbook damage results.)

title: Form a Wall!
detail:
(Enemy models suffer +1 TN to Shots
while this model is within 4" of a
friendly goalpost.)

title: Sidestep
text:
The player that has the Initiative
may choose 1-3 friendly models.
Each chosen model may make a 2"
dodge. Then the other player may
choose up to the same number of
friendly models. Each chosen model
may make a 2" dodge.

title:
Pass Out the
Orange Slices
text:
Friendly models on the pitch
immediately recover 2 HP.

title:
Hit ’Em Where
it Hurts!
text:
Choose an enemy Squaddie model.
The chosen model suffers Weak Point.

title: Lock Them Down
text:
Choose an enemy Squaddie model.
The chosen model suffers -1 TAC.

title: Cool Head
text:
The first time a friendly model
would spend MP for an action or
momentous ability this turn, except
for a Shot or Snap Shot, it may do so
without spending MP.

title: Aggressive Defence
text:
Friendly models gain Poised while
within the enemy half of the pitch.
detail:
(Once per turn, this model may make a
Counter Attack without spending MP.)

title: Never Say Die
text:
Each time a friendly model suffers
the taken out condition, the friendly
team gains +2 MP.

title: Raw Enthusiasm
text:
Choose a friendly Squaddie model. The
chosen model gains Put Me Back In, Coach!
detail:
(Once per turn when this model suffers
the taken out condition, this model
may immediately remove the taken out
condition and return to the pitch as if it
were the Maintenance Phase.)
